action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows two elephants, one adult and one baby, walking on a grassy area. The adult elephant is on the right, and the baby elephant is on the left. The background includes a dirt path and patches of grass. The adult elephant's trunk is hanging down, and the baby elephant is walking close to the adult.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows two elephants standing on a dry, dusty plain. One elephant is significantly larger than the other, suggesting it is an adult and a juvenile. The background is hazy with a single tree visible in the distance. The ground is scattered with small pieces of wood or debris. The larger elephant has long, curved tusks, while the smaller one has shorter tusks.
